response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value to me. I am offering this product to you at a special price of $750,000. This is a significant discount from its true worth, reflecting my desire to find the right person who appreciates its true value. Please let me know if you are interested in discussing this further.", "product_price": 750000}
